SageTVPlugin.Name: Squeezeslave Player
SageTVPlugin.Description: This is the Squeezeslave Player which runs on a SageTV extender (Unlimited Free Trial) - no need to install separately.
SageTVPlugin.Author: routerunner
SageTVPlugin.ReleaseNotes:
1.0.0 - First Public Release. Supported extenders: HD200, HD300
2.0.0 - Added support for MediaMVP. Fixed digital noise on HDx00. Better synchronisation support. License required.
2.0.1 - Better mutual exclusion mechanism. Fixed audio static noise issue with HD200/HD300 - IMPORTANT! Please hard power cycle the extender after the update.
2.0.2 - Massively reduced CPU usage. Fixed Ogg Vorbis support issue.
2.1.0 - Add support to HD100 extender. Support older HD300 firmware. Pure Digital Audio (HD100 only).
2.2.0 - Add support to IR remote control (see Plugin: Squeezeslave v2 announcement thread for details). Capabilities registration mechanism (requires Squeeze Server v7.4 or above).
2.2.1 - Various issue introduced by the remote control. Fix HD300 S/PDIF issue after watching HDTV. Added support for remote control "Home" button. Honour the LMS "Power on Resume" setting. Added unlimited trial mode.
2.2.2 - Add support of Pure Digital Audio Output to MediaMVP. Add Wake-On-Line support to all extenders.
2.3.0 - Add support of Pure Digital Audio Output to HD200/HD300. Add support of HDMI audio output to HD200/HD300.
